list_definition.definition: a mark by which anything is known; a quality

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The use of bright colours/colors is one of the features of her painting.

list_definition.definition: one of the parts of one’s face (eyes, nose etc)

list_definition.mean_english: bài đặc biệt (trong một tờ báo)
list_definition.definition: a special article in a newspaper

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: ‘The Times’ is doing a feature on winter holidays.

list_definition.mean_english: tiết mục chủ chốt; bộ phim chính
list_definition.definition: the main film in a cinema / movie theater programme/program etc
to give or have a part (especially an important one)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: That film features the best of the British actresses.
